title: Self-Supervised Graph Transformer for Deepfake Detection
abstract: A novel approach using spatial-temporal graph reasoning and self-supervised learning to detect high-fidelity manipulated media.

title: DFDT: An End-to-End Deepfake Detection Framework using Vision Transformer
abstract: Proposing a transformer-based architecture for identifying digital forgeries in video sequences.

title: Domain Name System Security and Privacy: A Contemporary Survey
abstract: A comprehensive analysis of DNS vulnerabilities, mitigation strategies, and privacy-preserving protocols.

title: Analyzing and Detecting Emerging Internet of Things Malware: A Graph-Based Approach
abstract: Utilizing graph-based representations of binary code to identify malicious patterns in heterogeneous IoT ecosystems.
